explains: n. 前任，前辈；（被取代的）原有事物，前身

sentences.en: He is cast in a different mould from his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他和他的前任性格不一样。

sentences.en: The new governor is an improvement on his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 新任总督胜过他的前任。

sentences.en: He faced the same kind of problems as his predecessor.
sentences.cn: 他面临着与他的前任同样的问题。
